verbose_text: Warfarin therapy interferes with vitamin K epoxide reductase and induces a rapid drop in all vitamin K dependent clotting proteins, affecting Protein C (half-life 5 hours) before Factor VII (half-life 7 hours) and the other clotting factors II, IX, and X (half-lives 24-60 hours).
evidence: Warfarin therapy interferes with vitamin K epoxide reductase and induces a rapid drop in all vitamin K-dependent clotting proteins, affecting Protein C
